paragraphs.text:
def virtualGetData(sc:SparkContext, sqlContext:SQLContext, hdfsfolders:String, startTime:String, endTime:String):RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])]={
val hdfspaths = hdfsfolders.split(",")
val rid_disctime__cpuutil = VmCPUUtil.calculatePeriodAvgPerRidFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime)
      .map(s => ((s._1, s._2._1), s._2._2.toDouble)).coalesce(10)
val rid_disctime__diskrb = VmDiskReadByte.calculateDerivativePerRidFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime).coalesce(10)
val rid_disctime__diskwb = VmDiskWriteByte.calculateDerivativePerRidFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime).coalesce(10)
val rid_disctime__netinbyte = VmNetIncomingByte.calculateDerivativePerRidFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime).coalesce(10)
val rid_disctime__netoutbyte = VmNetOutgoingByte.calculateDerivativePerRidFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime).coalesce(10)
// This section joins data by resource ID to create the training data set
// The result dataset is organized as:
// for each descrete time (resource_id, (cpu_util, disk Read, disk Write, netIn, netOut, OFInBW, OFOutBW))
val rid_dt__2:RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])] = rid_disctime__cpuutil.join(rid_disctime__diskrb).filter(s => s._2._1.isInstanceOf[Double] && s._2._2.isInstanceOf[Double]).map(s => (s._1, Array[Double](s._2._1, s._2._2)))
val rid_dt__3:RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])] = rid_dt__2.join(rid_disctime__diskwb).map(s => (s._1, s._2._1 :+ s._2._2))
val rid_dt__4:RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])] = rid_dt__3.join(rid_disctime__netinbyte).map(s => (s._1, s._2._1 :+ s._2._2))
val rid_dt__5:RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])] = rid_dt__4.join(rid_disctime__netoutbyte).map(s => (s._1, s._2._1 :+ s._2._2))
val resultData = rid_dt__5
rid_dt__5.map(x => (x._1,x._2.mkString(" "))).saveAsTextFile("hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/monitoring/joseph/data1.csv")
resultData
}
